scripts.build:clean: rm -rf dist .turbo node_modules && pnpm -r clean && pnpm install && turbo run build
scripts.publish: pnpm -r clean && pnpm install && turbo run build && pnpm publish -r --filter='./sdks/typescript/packages/*'
scripts.publish:integrations: pnpm -r clean && pnpm install && turbo run build && pnpm publish -r --filter='./integrations/*'
scripts.publish:alpha: pnpm -r clean && pnpm install && turbo run build && pnpm publish -r --no-git-checks --filter='./sdks/typescript/packages/*' --tag alpha
